tags.name:
lrn-button
`Simple button wrapper with a few options`
tags.jsDoc:

 * `lrn-button`
 * @customElement lrn-button

tags.name:
lrn-button
`Simple button wrapper with a few options`
tags.jsDoc:
/**
 * `lrn-button`
 * @customElement lrn-button
 * `Simple button wrapper with a few options`
 *
 * @microcopy - language worth noting:
 *  -
 *

 * @polymer
 * @demo demo/index.html
 */

attributes.name: show-href
attributes.description: What to display for the resource

attributes.name: raised
attributes.description: If the button should be visually lifted off the UI.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Label to place in the text area

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: iron-icon to use (with iconset if needed)

attributes.name: hover-class
attributes.description: Classes to add / subtract based on the item being hovered.

attributes.name: icon-class
attributes.description: Icon class in the event you want it to look different from the text.

attributes.name: prefetch
attributes.description: Allow for prefetch data on hover

attributes.name: focus-state
attributes.description: Tracks if focus state is applied

properties.name: showHref
properties.description: What to display for the resource

properties.name: raised
properties.description: If the button should be visually lifted off the UI.

properties.name: label
properties.description: Label to place in the text area

properties.name: icon
properties.description: iron-icon to use (with iconset if needed)

properties.name: hoverClass
properties.description: Classes to add / subtract based on the item being hovered.

properties.name: iconClass
properties.description: Icon class in the event you want it to look different from the text.

properties.name: prefetch
properties.description: Allow for prefetch data on hover

properties.name: focusState
properties.description: Tracks if focus state is applied
